  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static double
    ALTERNATIVE_ROUTES_EXPLORATION_FACTOR
    Increases the changes to find more alternatives.
    static double
    ALTERNATIVE_ROUTES_MAX_SHARE
    Alternative routes may share a maximum of 70% of roads of the best route.
    static double
    ALTERNATIVE_ROUTES_MAX_WEIGHT
    Alternative routes may cost a maximum of 40% more than the best route.
    static double
    ALTERNATIVE_ROUTES_PLATEAU_FACTOR
    Specifies the minimum plateau portion of every alternative path that is required.
    static final Collection<Supplier<RoutingProfile>>
    PROFILES
     
    static final double
    TARGET_NODE_QUERY_DISTANCE
    If the distance of the query position to the closest node is lower than this value, then the closest node is used definitely as the source or target of the route.
    static final double
    TARGET_REQUEST_CONNECTION_THRESHOLD
    If the requested target point is this X meters away from the last node of the found route, another connection is added on which the target point is matched on.

      public static final Collection<Supplier<RoutingProfile>> PROFILES

    • ALTERNATIVE_ROUTES_MAX_SHARE

      public static double ALTERNATIVE_ROUTES_MAX_SHARE
      Alternative routes may share a maximum of 70% of roads of the best route.

    • ALTERNATIVE_ROUTES_MAX_WEIGHT

      public static double ALTERNATIVE_ROUTES_MAX_WEIGHT
      Alternative routes may cost a maximum of 40% more than the best route.

    • ALTERNATIVE_ROUTES_EXPLORATION_FACTOR

      public static double ALTERNATIVE_ROUTES_EXPLORATION_FACTOR
      Increases the changes to find more alternatives.

    • ALTERNATIVE_ROUTES_PLATEAU_FACTOR

      public static double ALTERNATIVE_ROUTES_PLATEAU_FACTOR
      Specifies the minimum plateau portion of every alternative path that is required.

    • TARGET_NODE_QUERY_DISTANCE

      public static final double TARGET_NODE_QUERY_DISTANCE
      If the distance of the query position to the closest node is lower than this value, then the closest node is used definitely as the source or target of the route. If the distance is larger, the route may start or end on the connection the query is matched on.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TARGET_REQUEST_CONNECTION_THRESHOLD

      public static final double TARGET_REQUEST_CONNECTION_THRESHOLD
      If the requested target point is this X meters away from the last node of the found route, another connection is added on which the target point is matched on.
      See Also:
